original_text: And they came up against Judah and invaded it and carried away all the possessions they found that belonged to the king's house, and also his sons and his wives, so that no son was left to him except Jehoahaz, his youngest son.
korean_text: 그들이 올라와서 유다를 침략하여 왕궁의 모든 재물과 그의 아들들과 아내들을 탈취하였으므로 막내 아들 여호아하스 외에는 한 아들도 남지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And they came up against Judah
and carried away all the possessions
they found that belonged to the king's house
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 발견한 왕의 집에 속한 것들

sentences.original_text: and also his sons and his wives
so that no son was left to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 아들이 한 명도 남지 않게 되었으니
